title: Woeful Second World War
description: HORRIBLE HISTORIESIt's history with the nasty bits left in!Want to know:☠ Who made a meal out of maggots?☠ Which smelly soldiers were sniffed out by their enemies?☠ Why white knickers could kill you?Discover all the foul facts about THE WOEFUL SECOND WORLD WAR — all the gore and more!
author: Terry Deary
